subject: Use default floor domain.
commitMessage:
Use default floor domain.

Change-Id: Ibdc367c4740298dec3debb08d0260c2597cad908
Signed-off-by: Junfeng Dong <junfeng.dong@intel.com>

comments.message: Patch Set 1: Code-Review+1

Patch Set 1:

Dear Junfeng,

Why are modifying the SMACK rule?
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2

Patch Set 1:

Can someone please verify this patch and mark verified..
Patch Set 1: Code-Review-1

Patch Set 1:

Have we all made a consensus on clearing smack rule?

Patch Set 1: Verified+1

The Tizen 3.0 Smack domains have not been finalized yet. Before the domains are finalized, Setting the domain to floor is correct for the time being. and the is to fix the install error as follows:
[391/391] installing osp-security-service-1.2.2.0-4.15
[  310s] error: A domain name cert-svc hasn't been yet defined by any package. Can't verify if it is allowed
[  310s] error: AC domain setup failed for osp-security-service
[  310s] error: osp-security-service-1.2.2.0-4.15.i686: install failed
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
